translation: Whatever you do, whatever you eat, whatever you offer in sacrifice, whatever you give, whatever austerity you practice, O Arjuna, do it as an offering to Me.
commentary: 9.27 that whatever? do thou doest? That whatever? Do you eat thou eatest? That whatever? Juhoshi thou offerest in sacrifice? Do you give thou givest? That whatever? That whatever? Do you practice austerity thou practisest? Kaunteya Or Kaunteya? That that? Kurushv do? Madarpana offering unto Me.Commentary Consecrate all acts to the Lord. Then you will be freed from the bondage of Karma. You will have freedom in action.
